import React from 'react' import Reseller from './images/reseller.jpg' import YChooseUs from './images/y choose us image.png' import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import Footer from './Footer' import $ from 'jquery' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; const ResselerMain = () => { // default collapse start here $(document).ready(function(){ $(".collapse1").click(function(){ $(".collapseshow1").toggle(); }); }); // default collapse end here return ( <> Best Reseller Web Hosting Services in Pakistan | Hosters Pk
{/* reseller */}

Reseller Hosting

Our Reseller programs are fully secured and reliable. Hosters.pk provides best services not only limited to sell hostings. But they also have wide range of services which may offer our clients can make money. Our Services also includes Domain Names, Web Hosting, Reseller Hosting Plans, VPS, and Cloud VPS. And Dedicated Servers, SSLs, Managed WordPress Services, Web Development & many more.
{/* why choose unders */}

Why Choose Us

Our Reseller programs are fully secured and reliable. Hosters.pk provides best services not only limited to sell hostings. But they also have wide range of services which may offer our clients can make money. Our Services also includes Domain Names, Web Hosting, Reseller Hosting Plans, VPS, and Cloud VPS. And Dedicated Servers, SSLs, Managed WordPress Services, Web Development & many more.
{/* card section */}

{/* features */}

Features

Special For Developers

PHP, PHP 7.x, 5.x Support with Version Selector
WordPress, Joomla, Prestashop, OpenCart, Magento 250+
MySQL Databases
phpMyAdmin for MySQL
Cron Jobs
SitePad Website Builder
Shell Access / SFTP
Ruby on Rails

Why Choose Us

30 Days Moneyback Guaranted
99.9% 100% UpTime Guaranted
Free Domain Registeration
No Hidden Charges
Enterprise RAID 10 Drives
Phone, Email, Chat & Whatsapp Support
In Business Since 2006 with more then 2400+ Sites
Experienced & Friendly Support Staff
Multiple Landline & Toll free #Support

Email Features

Mail Boxes
POP3 / SMTP / IMAP
Web Based Email
Spam & Virus Protection
Email Groups
Email lists
Catch-All Mail Addresses

Other Resources

FTP Accounts
Domain Aliases
Scheduled Tasks , Crontab
File MIME Types
File Manager
Application Packs (Self Install Scripts)
Raw Log Files
Web Traffic Statistic
Flash, Streaming Audio / Video Support

Supported Products Addons

SSL Certificate & Dedicated IP
Advanced Website Security
Corporate / Business Email

Datacenters Specs

Redundant Fibre Carriers (6+)
Six pairs with 2+ strands each
Automatic failover between fiber pairs.
247 Network Monitoring
Nightly Security Updates
{/* FAQs */}

SS Reseller FAQs

What Is A Reseller Hosting?

Reseller hosting is a type of web hosting in which the account owner uses his allotted hard drive space and bandwidth to hose the websites of third parties. The account owner is the reseller, as he purchases the services of a parent web hosting company and sells it as his own.

How Do I Transfer Web Pages To Server?

Generate a 'Full Backup' of your website and store it on the server by selecting 'Home Directory' as the destination from the cPanel. ... Login to WHM using the details provided in the welcome email. Click on 'Transfer Button' on the Home page.

Purchased A Hosting.Now What Do I Do?

Choosing a reseller hosting business startup plan. Let's start our guide with how to choose from different plans. ... Do not buy the cheapest plan. ... Use a corporate billing system. ... Provide 24/7 support. ... Use private nameservers. ... Install an SSL certificate. ... Add trust seals to the footer of your website.

{/* footer */}
) } export default ResselerMain
